sad.arabic: لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
sad.transliteration: La yukallifu Allahu nafsan illa wus'aha
sad.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
For indeed, with hardship will be ease.
Indeed, with hardship will be ease.

sad.arabic: وَلَا تَهِنُوا۟ وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا۟ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَوْنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
sad.transliteration: Wa la tahinu wa la tahzanu wa antumu al-a'lawna in kuntum mu'mineen
sad.translation: So do not weaken and do not grieve, and you will be superior if you are true believers.

sad.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ
sad.transliteration: Qul ya 'ibadiya allatheena asrafu 'ala anfusihim la taqnatu min rahmati Allahi
sad.translation: Say, O My servants who have transgressed against themselves by sinning, do not despair of the mercy of Allah.

sad.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱسْتَعِينُوا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
sad.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanu ista'eenu bissabri wassalah inna Allaha ma'a assabireen
sad.translation: O you who have believed, seek help through patience and prayer. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
And the Hereafter is better for you than the first life.
And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.

sad.arabic: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُم بِشَىْءٍ مِّنَ ٱلْخَوْفِ وَٱلْجُوعِ وَنَقْصٍ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْوَٰلِ وَٱلْأَنفُسِ وَٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ
sad.transliteration: Walanabluwannakum bishay'in mina alkhawfi waljoo'i wanaqsin mina al-amwali wal-anfusi waththamarat
sad.translation: And We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits, but give good tidings to the patient.

sad.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَـٰبَتْهُم مُّصِيبَةٌ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّآ إِلَيْهِ رَٰجِعُونَ
sad.transliteration: Allatheena itha asabat-hum museebatun qalu inna lillahi wa-inna ilayhi raji'oon
sad.translation: Who, when disaster strikes them, say, 'Indeed we belong to Allah, and indeed to Him we will return.'

sad.arabic: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ هَوْنًا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلْجَـٰهِلُونَ قَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا
sad.transliteration: Wa'ibadu arrahmani allatheena yamshoona 'ala al-ardi hawnan wa-itha khatabahumu aljahiloona qaloo salaman
sad.translation: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth in humility, and when the ignorant address them harshly, they say words of peace.

sad.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِى فَٱغْفِرْ لِى فَغَفَرَ لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
sad.transliteration: Qala rabbi innee thalamtu nafsee faghfir lee faghafara lahu innahu huwa alghafooru arraheem
sad.translation: He said, 'My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, so forgive me,' and He forgave him. Indeed, He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.

sad.arabic: فَسَقَىٰ لَهُمَا ثُمَّ تَوَلَّىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلظِّلِّ فَقَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى لِمَآ أَنزَلْتَ إِلَىَّ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَقِيرٌ
sad.transliteration: Fasaqa lahuma thumma tawalla ila aththilli faqala rabbi innee lima anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqeer
sad.translation: So he watered their flocks for them; then he went back to the shade and said, 'My Lord, indeed I am, for whatever good You would send down to me, in need.'

sad.arabic: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
sad.transliteration: Faqultu istaghfiroo rabbakum innahu kana ghaffaran
sad.translation: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.'

sad.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً
sad.transliteration: Rabbana la tuzigh quloobana ba'da ith hadaytana wahab lana min ladunka rahmatan
sad.translation: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us from Yourself mercy.

sad.arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْنِى فَرْدًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْوَٰرِثِينَ
sad.transliteration: Wazakariyya ith nada rabbahu rabbi la tatharnee fardan wa-anta khayru alwaritheen
sad.translation: And mention Zechariah, when he called to his Lord, 'My Lord, do not leave me alone as heir, and You are the best of inheritors.'

sad.arabic: رَبَّنَا عَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْنَا وَإِلَيْكَ أَنَبْنَا وَإِلَيْكَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
sad.transliteration: Rabbana 'alayka tawakkalna wa-ilayka anabna wa-ilayka almaseer
sad.translation: Our Lord, upon You we have relied, and to You we have returned, and to You is the destination.

anxious.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَطْمَئِنُّ قُلُوبُهُم بِذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ أَلَا بِذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ تَطْمَئِنُّ ٱلْقُلُوبُ
anxious.transliteration: Allatheena amanoo watatma-innu quloobuhum bithikri Allahi ala bithikri Allahi tatma-innu alquloobu
anxious.translation: Those who have believed and whose hearts are assured by the remembrance of Allah. Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured.

anxious.arabic: لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
anxious.transliteration: La yukallifu Allahu nafsan illa wus'aha
anxious.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

anxious.arabic: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُۥٓ
anxious.translation: And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him.

anxious.arabic: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا
anxious.transliteration: Qul lan yuseebana illa ma kataba Allahu lana
anxious.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us; He is our protector.'

anxious.arabic: إِن يَنصُرْكُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا غَالِبَ لَكُمْ
anxious.transliteration: In yansur-kumu Allahu fala ghaliba lakum
anxious.translation: If Allah should aid you, no one can overcome you.

anxious.arabic: وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَنَـٰزَعُوا۟ فَتَفْشَلُوا۟ وَتَذْهَبَ رِيحُكُمْ ۖ وَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟
anxious.transliteration: Wa atee'u Allaha wa rasulahu wa la tanaza'u fatafshaloo watathhaba reehukum wasbiru
anxious.translation: And obey Allah and His Messenger, and do not dispute and thus lose courage and then your strength would depart; and be patient.

anxious.arabic: إِن تَمْسَسْكُمْ حَسَنَةٌ تَسُؤْهُمْ وَإِن تُصِبْكُمْ سَيِّئَةٌ يَفْرَحُوا۟ بِهَا ۖ وَإِن تَصْبِرُوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ لَا يَضُرُّكُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا
anxious.transliteration: In tamsaskum hasanatun tasu'hum wa-in tusibkum sayyi-atun yafrahoo biha wa-in tasbiroo watattaqoo la yadurrukum kayduhum shay'a
anxious.translation: If good touches you, it distresses them; but if harm strikes you, they rejoice at it. And if you are patient and fear Allah, their plot will not harm you at all.

anxious.arabic: وَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّ ٱلْعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًا
anxious.transliteration: Wala yahzunka qawluhum inna al-'izzata lillahi jamee'an
anxious.translation: And let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, honor belongs to Allah entirely.

anxious.arabic: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
anxious.translation: And rely upon Allah. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.

anxious.arabic: أَلَا إِنَّ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
anxious.transliteration: Ala inna awliyaa Allahi la khawfun 'alayhim wala hum yahzanoon
anxious.translation: Unquestionably, for the allies of Allah there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve.

anxious.arabic: وَلَا تَخَافُوا۟ وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا۟ وَأَبْشِرُوا۟ بِٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
anxious.transliteration: Wala takhafoo wala tahzanoo wa-abshiroo biljannati allatee kuntum too'adoon
anxious.translation: Do not fear and do not grieve but receive good tidings of Paradise, which you were promised.

anxious.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوا۟ وَّٱلَّذِينَ هُم مُّحْسِنُونَ
anxious.transliteration: Inna Allaha ma'a allatheena ittaqaw wallatheena hum muhsinoon
anxious.translation: Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
Do not grieve; indeed Allah is with us.

anxious.arabic: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
anxious.transliteration: Waman yatawakkal 'ala Allahi fa-inna Allaha 'azeezun hakeem
anxious.translation: And whoever relies upon Allah - then indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.

happy.arabic: قُلْ بِفَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ وَبِرَحْمَتِهِۦ فَبِذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَفْرَحُوا۟
happy.transliteration: Qul bifadli Allahi wabirahma-tihi fabithalika falyafrahoo
happy.translation: Say, 'In the bounty of Allah and in His mercy - in that let them rejoice.'

happy.arabic: وَإِن تَعُدُّوا۟ نِعْمَةَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحْصُوهَآ
happy.transliteration: Wa-in ta'uddoo ni'mata Allahi la tuhsooha
happy.translation: And if you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them.

happy.arabic: مَنْ عَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَنُحْيِيَنَّهُۥ حَيَوٰةً طَيِّبَةً
happy.transliteration: Man 'amila salihan min dhakarin aw ontha wahuwa mu'minun falanuhyiyannahu hayatan tayyibatan
happy.translation: Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - We will surely cause him to live a good life.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

happy.arabic: يُؤْتِى ٱلْحِكْمَةَ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَن يُؤْتَ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ فَقَدْ أُوتِىَ خَيْرًا كَثِيرًا
happy.transliteration: Yu'ti alhikmata man yasha'u waman yu'ta alhikmata faqad ootiya khayran katheeran
happy.translation: He gives wisdom to whom He wills, and whoever has been given wisdom has certainly been given much good.

happy.arabic: فَلَا تَعْلَمُ نَفْسٌ مَّآ أُخْفِىَ لَهُم مِّن قُرَّةِ أَعْيُنٍ جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
happy.transliteration: Fala ta'lamu nafsun ma ukhfiya lahum min qurrati a'yunin jaza-an bima kanu ya'maloon
happy.translation: And no soul knows what has been hidden for them of comfort for eyes as reward for what they used to do.
Enter Paradise, you and your kinds, delighted.

happy.arabic: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِصِحَافٍ مِّن ذَهَبٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ ۖ وَفِيهَا مَا تَشْتَهِيهِ ٱلْأَنفُسُ وَتَلَذُّ ٱلْأَعْيُنُ
happy.transliteration: Yutafu 'alayhim bisihafin min thahabin wa-akwabin wafiha ma tashtaheehi al-anfusu wataladhdhu al-a'yunu
happy.translation: Circulated among them will be plates and vessels of gold. And therein is whatever the souls desire and what delights the eyes.
Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers.

happy.arabic: فَٱنقَلَبُوا۟ بِنِعْمَةٍ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَضْلٍ لَّمْ يَمْسَسْهُمْ سُوٓءٌ
happy.transliteration: Fanqalabu bini'matin mina Allahi wafadlin lam yamsashum soo-on
happy.translation: So they returned with favor from Allah and bounty, no harm having touched them.
Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure.

happy.arabic: وَمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَآ إِلَّا لَعِبٌ وَلَهْوٌ ۖ وَلَلدَّارُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لِّلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ
happy.transliteration: Wama alhayatu addunya illa la'ibun walahwun waladdaru al-akhiratu khayrun lillatheena yattaqoon
happy.translation: And the worldly life is not but amusement and diversion; but the home of the Hereafter is best for those who fear Allah.

happy.arabic: لِّلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ
happy.transliteration: Lillatheena ahsanoo fee hathihi addunya hasanatun
happy.translation: For those who do good in this world is good.

grateful.translation: If you are grateful, I will surely increase you in favor.

grateful.arabic: فَٱذْكُرُونِىٓ أَذْكُرْكُمْ وَٱشْكُرُوا۟ لِى وَلَا تَكْفُرُونِ
grateful.transliteration: Fathkurooni athkurkum washkuroo lee wala takfuroon
grateful.translation: So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.

grateful.arabic: وَإِن تَعُدُّوا۟ نِعْمَةَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحْصُوهَآ
grateful.transliteration: Wa-in ta'uddoo ni'mata Allahi la tuhsooha
grateful.translation: And if you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them.
But as for the favor of your Lord, report it.
And whoever is grateful - his gratitude is only for the benefit of himself.

grateful.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
grateful.transliteration: Qul huwa allathee ansha-akum waja'ala lakumu assamAAa wal-absara wal-af-idata qaleelan ma tashkuroon
grateful.translation: Say, 'It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.'

grateful.arabic: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
grateful.transliteration: Allathee at'amahum min joo'in wa-amanahum min khawf
grateful.translation: Who has fed them, saving them from hunger and made them safe, saving them from fear.

grateful.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا لُقْمَـٰنَ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ أَنِ ٱشْكُرْ لِلَّهِ
grateful.transliteration: Walaqad atayna luqmana alhikmata ani oshkur lillah
grateful.translation: And We had certainly given Luqman wisdom and said, 'Be grateful to Allah.'

grateful.arabic: وَءَاتَىٰكُم مِّن كُلِّ مَا سَأَلْتُمُوهُ ۚ وَإِن تَعُدُّوا۟ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحْصُوهَآ
grateful.transliteration: Wa-atakum min kulli ma sa-altumooh wa-in ta'uddoo ni'mata Allahi la tuhsooha
grateful.translation: And He gave you from all you asked of Him. And if you should count the favor of Allah, you could not enumerate them.

grateful.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ
grateful.transliteration: Alam tara anna Allaha sakhkhara lakum ma fee al-ardi
grateful.translation: Do you not see that Allah has subjected to you whatever is on the earth?

grateful.arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ وَٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ وَٱلنُّجُومُ مُسَخَّرَٰتٌۢ بِأَمْرِهِۦٓ
grateful.transliteration: Wasakhkhara lakumu allayla wannahara washshamsa walqamara wannujomu musakhkharatun bi-amrihi
grateful.translation: And He has subjected to you the night and day and the sun and moon, and the stars are subjected by His command.
And He gave you from all you asked of Him.

grateful.arabic: لَئِن شَكَرْتُمْ لَأَزِيدَنَّكُمْ ۖ وَلَئِن كَفَرْتُمْ إِنَّ عَذَابِى لَشَدِيدٌ
grateful.transliteration: La-in shakartum la-azeedannakum wala-in kafartum inna 'athabee lashadeed
grateful.translation: If you are grateful, I will surely increase you in favor; but if you deny, indeed, My punishment is severe.
And He found you lost and guided you.
And He found you poor and made you self-sufficient.

stressed.arabic: لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
stressed.transliteration: La yukallifu Allahu nafsan illa wus'aha
stressed.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

stressed.arabic: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا ۝ إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
stressed.transliteration: Fa inna ma'al 'usri yusra, inna ma'al 'usri yusra
stressed.translation: For indeed, with hardship will be ease. Indeed, with hardship will be ease.

stressed.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَطْمَئِنُّ قُلُوبُهُم بِذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ
stressed.transliteration: Allatheena amanoo watatma-innu quloobuhum bithikri Allahi
stressed.translation: Those who have believed and whose hearts are assured by the remembrance of Allah.

stressed.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱسْتَعِينُوا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ
stressed.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo ista'eenoo bissabri wassalah
stressed.translation: O you who have believed, seek help through patience and prayer.

stressed.arabic: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًا
stressed.transliteration: Waman yattaqi Allaha yaj'al lahu makhrajan
stressed.translation: And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out.
And He provides for him from sources he never imagined.

stressed.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱصْبِرُوا۟ وَصَابِرُوا۟ وَرَابِطُوا۟ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
stressed.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo isbiroo wasabiroo warabitoo wattaqoo Allaha la'allakum tuflihoon
stressed.translation: O you who have believed, persevere and endure and remain stationed and fear Allah that you may be successful.

stressed.arabic: أَحَسِبَ ٱلنَّاسُ أَن يُتْرَكُوٓا۟ أَن يَقُولُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا وَهُمْ لَا يُفْتَنُونَ
stressed.transliteration: Ahasiba annasu an yutrakoo an yaqooloo amanna wahum la yuftanoon
stressed.translation: Do the people think that they will be left to say, 'We believe' and they will not be tried?

stressed.arabic: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۖ فَلَيَعْلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا۟
stressed.transliteration: Walaqad fatanna allatheena min qablihim falaya'lamanna Allahu allatheena sadaqoo
stressed.translation: But We have certainly tried those before them, and Allah will surely make evident those who are truthful.
So be patient with gracious patience.

stressed.arabic: وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا أَصَابَكَ ۖ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ عَزْمِ ٱلْأُمُورِ
stressed.transliteration: Wasbir 'ala ma asabaka inna thalika min 'azmi al-omoor
stressed.translation: And be patient over what befalls you. Indeed, all that is of the matters requiring determination.

stressed.arabic: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
stressed.transliteration: Innama yuwaffa assabiroon ajrahum bighayri hisab
stressed.translation: Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account.
And give good tidings to the patient.

stressed.arabic: وَٱسْتَعِينُوا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ۚ وَإِنَّهَا لَكَبِيرَةٌ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱلْخَـٰشِعِينَ
stressed.transliteration: Wasta'eenoo bissabri wassalati wa-innaha lakabeeratun illa 'ala alkhashi'een
stressed.translation: And seek help through patience and prayer, and indeed, it is difficult except for the humbly submissive to Allah.

stressed.arabic: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَعْلَمَ ٱلْمُجَـٰهِدِينَ مِنكُمْ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
stressed.transliteration: Walanabluwannakum hatta na'lama almujahideena minkum wassabireen
stressed.translation: And We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you and the patient.
Persevere and endure and remain stationed.

hopeful.arabic: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
hopeful.transliteration: Fa inna ma'al 'usri yusra
hopeful.translation: For indeed, with hardship will be ease.

hopeful.arabic: وَلَا تَيْأَسُوا۟ مِن رَّوْحِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يَيْأَسُ مِن رَّوْحِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
hopeful.transliteration: Wa la tay'asoo min rawhi Allahi innahu la yay'asu min rawhi Allahi illa alqawmu alkafiroon
hopeful.translation: And despair not of relief from Allah. Indeed, no one despairs of relief from Allah except the disbelieving people.

hopeful.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ
hopeful.transliteration: Qul ya 'ibadiya allatheena asrafu 'ala anfusihim la taqnatu min rahmati Allahi
hopeful.translation: Say, O My servants who have transgressed against themselves by sinning, do not despair of the mercy of Allah.

hopeful.arabic: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِى عَنِّى فَإِنِّى قَرِيبٌ ۖ أُجِيبُ دَعْوَةَ ٱلدَّاعِ إِذَا دَعَانِ
hopeful.transliteration: Wa-itha sa-alaka 'ibadee 'annee fa-innee qareeb ujeeb da'wata adda'i itha da'ani
hopeful.translation: And when My servants ask you concerning Me - indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me.

hopeful.arabic: وَقَالَ رَبُّكُمُ ٱدْعُونِىٓ أَسْتَجِبْ لَكُمْ
hopeful.transliteration: Waqala rabbukumu od'oonee astajib lakum
hopeful.translation: And your Lord says, 'Call upon Me; I will respond to you.'

hopeful.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
hopeful.transliteration: Inna Allaha la yudee'u ajra almuhsineen
hopeful.translation: Indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of those who do good.

hopeful.arabic: وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى رَحِيمٌ وَدُودٌ
hopeful.transliteration: Wastaghfiroo rabbakum thumma tooboo ilayhi inna rabbee raheemun wadood
hopeful.translation: And ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is Merciful and Affectionate.

hopeful.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ إِنَّ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقٌّ
hopeful.transliteration: Fasbir inna wa'da Allahi haqq
hopeful.translation: So be patient. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth.

hopeful.arabic: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ يَهْدِ قَلْبَهُۥ
hopeful.transliteration: Ma asaba min museebatin illa bi-ithni Allahi waman yu'min billahi yahdi qalbahu
hopeful.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah. And whoever believes in Allah - He will guide his heart.

hopeful.arabic: أَمْ حَسِبْتُمْ أَن تَدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَلَمَّا يَأْتِكُم مَّثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوْا۟ مِن قَبْلِكُم
hopeful.transliteration: Am hasibtum an tadkhuloo aljannata walamma ya'tikum mathalu allatheena khalaw min qablikum
hopeful.translation: Or do you think that you will enter Paradise while such trial has not yet come to you as came to those who passed on before you?

hopeful.arabic: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
hopeful.transliteration: Inna ma'a al'usri yusra
hopeful.translation: Indeed, with hardship will be ease.

hopeful.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُنَزِّلُ ٱلْغَيْثَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا قَنَطُوا۟
hopeful.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee yunazzilu alghaytha min ba'di ma qanatoo
hopeful.translation: And it is He who sends down the rain after they had despaired and spreads His mercy.

hopeful.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ
hopeful.transliteration: Qul ya 'ibadi allatheena amanoo ittaqoo rabbakum lillatheena ahsanoo fee hathihi addunya hasanatun
hopeful.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord. For those who do good in this world is good.'

hopeful.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَغْفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
hopeful.transliteration: Inna Allaha yaghfiru aththunooba jamee'an innahu huwa alghafooru arraheem
hopeful.translation: Indeed, Allah forgives all sins. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful.

hopeful.arabic: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
hopeful.transliteration: Rabbana innana amanna faghfir lana thunoobana waqina 'athaba annar
hopeful.translation: Our Lord, indeed we have believed, so forgive us our sins and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

hopeful.arabic: وَرَحْمَتِى وَسِعَتْ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ
hopeful.transliteration: Warahmatee wasi'at kulla shay'
hopeful.translation: But My mercy encompasses all things.

hopeful.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ مِن ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يَدْخُلُونَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ
hopeful.transliteration: Waman ya'mal mina assalihati min thakarin aw ontha wahuwa mu'minun fa-ola-ika yadkhuloona aljannata
hopeful.translation: And whoever does righteous deeds, whether male or female, while being a believer - those will enter Paradise.

hopeful.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ
hopeful.transliteration: Inna Allaha la yukhlifu almee'ad
hopeful.translation: Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise.

hopeful.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
hopeful.transliteration: Wallahu khayrun wa-abqa
hopeful.translation: But Allah is best and more enduring.

hopeful.arabic: فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ مَوْلَىٰهُ وَجِبْرِيلُ وَصَـٰلِحُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۖ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ ظَهِيرٌ
hopeful.transliteration: Fa-inna Allaha huwa mawlahu wajibreelu wasalihu almu'mineena walmala-ikatu ba'da thalika thaheer
hopeful.translation: Then indeed Allah is his protector, and Gabriel and the righteous of the believers and the angels, moreover, are his assistants.
